scripts.fetch: CAL_USERNAME="$CAL_USERNAME" CAL_PASSWORD="$CAL_PASSWORD" cargo run --manifest-path rust/Cargo.toml --bin fetcher
scripts.build:wasm: cargo build --manifest-path rust/Cargo.toml --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -p ics_wasm && mkdir -p public/wasm && cp rust/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/ics_wasm.wasm public/wasm/ics_wasm.wasm
